title: Clay-tastic

speakers.name: Alexis Glenn
speakers.bio: Alexis is a 7th grade student in western Pennsylvania.  She loves creating anything out of clay, reading, violin, and talking to friends.  She lives with her Mom and Dad, brother, 2 dogs, 2 hermit crabs, and many fish.

excerpt: In this hands-on session, Kidz will learn about the different types of clay, what they are used for, and basic sculpting techniques.  Kids will make their own sculpture with air-dry clay using their newfound skills.
